summary: The C-130 Hercules is a military transport plane made by Lockheed Martin. It can land and take off from unpaved runways, making it very versatile. This aircraft has many uses, such as carrying troops, medical evacuations, and even fighting fires. It can also be used as a gunship. The C-130 has been in service since 1956 and is still used by many countries. It is the longest-produced military aircraft, with over 70 years of production.
title: Lockheed C-130 Hercules
